channel.title: Javac: file not found:
channel.description:
Okay, I need help with this error. Everytime I try and compile my client, I get this.
javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
The one that can help me solve this problem OR that has a client that can run with Dynasty WITHOUT any bugs/glitches; wil get something. Just private message me here or post here if you know the problem and I'll private message you.

item.title: Javac: file not found:
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

Did you edit the compiler to your jdk?
